meanings.definition: Covered in a pattern of stripes and squares
meanings.sent1: The plaided blanket kept me warm on the chilly night.
meanings.sent2: She wore a plaided scarf to match her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The plaided tablecloth made the picnic look extra festive.
meanings.sent4: The plaided walls of the room gave it a cozy cabin feel.
meanings.sent5: The plaided design on the socks was eye-catching.

meanings.sent1: The plaided shirt he had on clashed with his striped pants.
meanings.sent2: She looked stylish in her plaided skirt and boots.
meanings.sent3: The plaided hat made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her plaided jacket was a bold fashion statement.
meanings.sent5: The plaided dress was perfect for the fall weather.

meanings.sent1: The plaided curtains added a touch of charm to the room.
meanings.sent2: The plaided table was set beautifully for the dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The plaided cake was a delightful surprise at the birthday celebration.
meanings.sent4: The plaided gift wrap made the present look extra special.
meanings.sent5: The plaided banner fluttered in the breeze at the outdoor event.
